headline: Here's How Many Shares of Altria Group You Should Own to Get $500 in Yearly Dividends
summary: Generating income from dividends can prove very satisfying and rewarding.  Altria Group (NYSE: MO) has made a commitment to returning cash to shareholders.  The company states it prioritizes consistently growing dividends, targeting a mid-single-digit percentage annual increase.

headline: Altria Group: HTS Portfolio May Be A Missing Piece In The Puzzle (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Altria's success depends on its HTS market entry via the Horizon JV with Japan Tobacco. Click here to read why MO stock is a Buy.
